title: WTS: SGC graded T206s in high grade, 84 and higher...
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTS: SGC graded T206s in high grade, 84 and higher...
posts.post_content:
Looking to sell some graded 84 and higher, please email or PM for scans and prices. Please note that the POP's indicated are of all backs. Several of these cards are extremely scarce population wise, thanks...

Reulbach (glove shows) SCap 150, SGC 84....Impossible common in high grade
Schulte (front view) Pied 150, SGC 84....Impossible common in high grade
C. Coles Old Mill, SGC 84
Kisinger SCap 350 fact. 25, SGC 88 (ONLY 3 PSA 7's, 1 PSA 8) Only PSA 8 sold for $8600!
Camnitz (arm at side) SCap 350-460, SGC 88 (ONLY 1 PSA 8, none higher) Only PSA 8 sold for $11,500!
L. Doyle (bat) SCap 350, SGC 88 (Sould be a HOFer)
H. Jennings (both hands showing) SCap 350, SGC 86
Carlos Smith Old Mill, SGC 86 (ONLY 3 PSA 7's, 1 PSA 8)
Leifeld (Pitching) Pied 150, SGC 84
Bastian Old Mill, SGC 84
Willett Pied 350, SGC 86 (Incredibly low pop.)
R. Waddell (Port.) Pied 150, SGC 84
G. Brown (Chicago) Pied 150, SGC 86 (ONLY 3 PSA 7's, 1 PSA 8!)
Oakes SCap 350, SGC 88 (ONLY 1 PSA 8, none higher)..**SOLD**
C. Young (bare hand shows) Pied 150, SGC 88..**SOLD**
C. Young (glove shows) Tolstoi, SGC 86...**SOLD**
G. Street (Port.) Pied 350, SGC 88....**SOLD**
R. Manning (Pitching) Pied 350, SGC 86 (ONLY 1 PSA 7, one of the toughest cards in the set!)
B. Schmidt (Port.) Pied 350, SGC 84 (looks like an 8 other than centering)
B. Schmidt (Port.) Pied 350, SGC 88....**SOLD**
Quite a few left, pricing aggressively because of a large investment...Thanks
Still a bunch left. Most of these are extremely low pops., and please let me know if you are looking for anything else not listed, thanks....
